overview: Auto clicker - Auto mouse clicker - Auto keyboard clicker - Auto Keybot The main window of Auto Keybot allows to configure the script for the auto clicker/auto mouse/auto keyboard. You can configure delay or interval between mouse clicks, you can define the number of mouse clicks or keyboard clicks to be automated. Auto Clicker also allows to configure Interval / Delay in Mouse Clicks in values of Milli Seconds. Auto Clicker Auto Keybot also shows the timer and script progress in the progress bars. The Auto Clicker Software Download is offered on a free to try basis. You can try it for free unlimited or buy the full version for only $9. You can buy the full version securely via Paypal using Credit Cards. Do Contact us in case you have any questions about the Software Utility! Make your own auto clicker/auto typer scripts and test all the functions to see if this is a useful application for you. You get full control of auto mouse clicks and the ability to send auto keyboard commands to any application running in the Windows operating system. Download the FREE trial now! The full auto clicker version gives you the possibility to make very long scripts and comes with a Save / Load feature to store them for easy access.It also features more functions for intelligent and more complicated automation of your Windows PC.
